Fault.name: Mediators/HelloMediatorService.mplan
Fault.msg: Assigning property/constant "concat('Mediator says HELLO: ',$in.request/inp1:singleString)" to element "$out.reply/inp1:singleString". Please make sure target is single leaf node, otherwise non-leaf node will contain only string value which may generate non-valid xml as per the xsd.
